header_text: You are traveling to your vacation destination on an airplane. As the plane accelerates during takeoff, your chest begins to feel tight. You decide to do five minutes of a breathing exercise, and you end up feeling relaxed.

elements.Text: Are you scared that you won't be able to relax?
